sourcesContent:
import Item from './item' import React from 'react' import AnimationForFilter from '../utils/animation-for-filter' import { getDataByFilter2 } from '../firebase/connect' import { items } from '../utils/product-items' export default function Products(){ var [numbers] = React.useState([]) function amountOfPagination(){ getDataByFilter2('Collection', 'all') setTimeout(() =>{ for(var i = 0; i < Math.ceil(items.length / 6); i++){ numbers.push( {i} ) console.log('tai') } }, 0) return numbers } return (

SHOP ALL

FILTER BY

{amountOfPagination()}
 ) }
